string.text: Built around Leupold's Advanced Optical System, the M40 delivers tried and true light transmission, best in class glare reduction in harsh light and the resolution and clarity that recreational stalkers in the Zone demand.

The Aimpoint H1H has become a very popular hunting sight worldwide due to its size, light weight and robust build quality. It was designed with the hunter in mind. It is rugged and reliable, for increased confidence in the harshest of elements; a perfect fit for the Zone.
The Aimpoint CompM4s was designed for users who require a professional quality red dot optic for use under extremely harsh conditions.

The Eotech 553 was developed after extensive testing of various optical sights. The US Special Operations Command has standardized on the Eotech Holographic Weapon Sight as its 1X weapon optic for close quarter and urban combat zones.
Featuring the largest objective lens window on the market, this unique device was designed for close-quarters, offering fast target acquisition while maintaining pinpoint accuracy.
